rules_text:
Wayfarer [i](If you’ve spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} this turn, discover L’Or.)[/i]
Basalt Spray deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you’ve discovered L’Or, Basalt Spray deals 5 damage to that permanent instead.
notes:
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
